comment: Her tests are hard and do not reflect her power points at all. Dont waste ur time reading the book because her test r scenarios questions or basically real life cases so u have to decide what applies. What worked for me was highlighting the page she tells u in class to look back when taking the test. Test are online !!!
It seemed like it was her first time teaching. Tests were difficult and lectures were boring. I wouldn't recommend taking her class.
She was nice and class was easy. 5 tests with lowest dropped and one group project. I will say the class was miserably boring but she tried to keep it enjoyable.
